title: Stronghold Crusader Extreme Maxi-Image 100% Working
description:
Thanks to many people that helped to make this dream a reality.
The guide to make an Maxi-Image was quite a pain to follow, but here it&#039;s.
Now enjoy Stronghold Crusader Extreme.

Of course if you enjoyed it as we did with our original copies, BUY IT! The developers deserves it!



Gracias a mucha gente que ayudo a que pudiera crear la Maxi-Imagen ahora la tienen a disposicion.
Disfruten!

Pero recuerden que si les gusta el juego COMPRENLO! Asi como nosotros lo hicimos!

????????? ?????? ?????, ??????? ??????? ??????? ??? ????? ???????????. 
??? ??????? Maxi-Image ?????? ???? ???????, ?? ????? ???. 
?????? ???????????? ???????? Crusader Extreme. 

???????, ???? ??? ???????????, ??? ?? ??????? ? ?????? ???????????, ?????? ??! ???????????? ???????????!


INSTRUCTIONS:
Just mount the Maxi-Image with Daemon-Tools Lite v4.12.3 and enjoy the game. It works flawlessly!
